1_1JtxPipMFzvBTQ8fwSeupUxfiVMbutBfhG.body:
Jewish can even kill to get foreskins.  Unbelievable but true.
The old Jewish King Saul has a daughter. One day David after he killed Goliath comes along and requests the daughter's hand to be the future King.
The king is ready to give the marriage his blessing under one condition: David is to collect 100 foreskins from 100 enemy Philistines.
David, the brave Jew took his men with him and went out and killed two hundred Philistines and brought back their foreskins. Then Saul gave him his daughter Michal in marriage.
https://dwindlinginunbelief.blogspot.com/2010/01/david-buys-his-first-wife-with-200.html
